publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4592 Jackie Baillie: Aitkenbar Primary, Fabulous at 50â€”That the Parliament congratulates Aitkenbar Primary School on its 50th anniversary this year; notes that the school first opened its doors to pupils in 1959 and has been a vital part of the community ever since; understands that the school has a wide variety of activities planned to mark this momentous occasion, including a quilt made of old school jumpers from throughout the years, concert performances and an open week encouraging ex-pupils to come back and reminisce about their time at the school, and wishes all the pupils, teachers and parents well in their celebrations and for another successful 50 years. Supported by: Stuart McMillan, David Stewart, Jamie McGrigor, Mr Frank McAveety, Gil Paterson, Marilyn Livingstone
S3M-4592 Aitkenbar Primary, Fabulous at 50 (lodged on 13 July 2009) Mary Mulligan*
